title: Visualisation
text:

#   ²​degree_length, ³​room_and_board, ⁴​in_state_tuition, ⁵​in_state_total,
#   ⁶​out_of_state_tuition, ⁷​out_of_state_total


Here is visual table of the tuition cost data set. Here there is a list of colleges and their corresponding states in the US













This is visualization of the students of the University of Phoenix-Arizona. This data tries to demonstrate the percentage of races in the University of Phoenix-Arizona.
Credit to Alex Cookson

ggplot(tuition_cost, aes(state)) + geom_bar(fill="pink", color="black",binwidth =1)  




This bar chart shows a display of tuition cost in several states.

ggplot(tuition_cost, aes(type)) + geom_bar(fill="pink", color="blue",binwidth =20)  




This bar chart shows a display of number various types of instituitions ; Private, for profit and Public

title: Personal Portfolio
text: “Kindness creates an endless ripple that comes back to you’
